headline.main: Singapore's Polyglot Defenders Are Ready for Every Trick of Foe; Direct Assault, Long Bombardment and Terrorization to Break Morale Are All Expected in Unique Siege

lead_paragraph: SINGAPORE, Feb. 1 -- The thousands of empire troops manning battle stations in this island fortress are determined to check the hordes of Japan so that the Netherlands Indies and Australia can gain a breathing spell.
snippet: SINGAPORE, Feb. 1 -- The thousands of empire troops manning battle stations in this island fortress are determined to check the hordes of Japan so that the Netherlands Indies and Australia can gain a breathing spell....

byline.original: By DOUGLAS WILKIENorth American Newspaper Alliance
